title: Why choose me?
description: My passion is to treat the whole person and not just the pain area. I work with you towards your goals and to develop tools to take control of your life.

features.title: Quality Care
features.description: Providing a friendly and professional service, I specialise in supporting those with long term conditions.

features.title: Certifications
features.description: I am a fully qualified physiotherapist with post graduate certification in acupuncture and a pilates instructor.

features.title: One to One Sessions
features.description: For those with special requirements, I can provide one-to-one guidance and personalised service.

features.title: Regular Classes
features.description: I run weekly pilates sessions at a convenient location. Get in contact for more information.
